p: Inovio has made efforts to apply their Syncon® synthetic DNA vaccine platform to influenza. By sequence alignment and cluster grouping of HA they have generated four “micro-consensus” sequences within an influenza subtype, which were then cloned onto expression vectors and delivered to the vaccine recipient via in vivo electroporation [ 72]. In mouse and ferret models these micro-consensus sequences against H1N1, H3N2 and H7N9 were found to elicit protective immunity against lethal challenges.
